question: بس السكشن مايكون متحدد له دكتور صح؟
answer: الدكتور ما تقدر تعرفه الا بداية الفصل الجاي مع التسجيل العادي

question: كيف يمكنني البحث عن معلومات الدكاترة؟
answer: تقدر تبحث عن معلوماتهم وصورهم في حسابك الجامعي او اكتب اسمه في جوجل واكتب جنبه UTM

question: What is the UTM Job On Campus (JOC) Opportunity?
answer: Duration: 3 months (1st July - 30th Sept 2022). Allowances: RM7/hour (up to RM1232/month). Position Description: This position is intended for a student who is willing to work in a laboratory physically. It is based on an industrial project that focuses on technical aspects including (but not limited to): 1. 3D scanning 2. 3D modeling/designing 3. 3D printing 4. Post-processing of the 3D printed 5. Document preparation. The project is mainly focused on developing an Adaptive Assistive Device (AAD) for disabled persons. For example, prosthetic hand/leg, orthosis/braces, and other related rehabilitation devices. Working in the laboratory is a must since the candidate should utilize a 3D scanner and 3D printer. Skills Required: Only basic knowledge 1. CAD/CAE knowledge 2. Biomechanics knowledge 3. Biomaterial knowledge 4. 3D printing knowledge 5. Good communication skills 6. Good presentation skills. Interested candidates can apply through my.utm.my under JOC tab
